ygData.subject: Re: Cataloging?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t purchased the song, but as I understand it, it will identify magic items. Of course, currently all magic items are already identified. The word
ygData.messageBody:
David Rubino wrote:

> From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
>
>
> Have found nodescription on the Level 14 song other than its name
> "Lysssa's Cataloging Libretto" . . . anyone know what it does and if it is
> worth buying.
>

I haven't purchased the song, but as I understand it, it will identify magic
items.

Of course, currently all magic items are already identified.

The word on this song is... useless currently.

It's better than nothing though, which is what the level 14 song USED to be. :)

If this thing does something else, I'd love to hear it too.

>
> -Musil
>
> PS, can anyone point everyone to a GOOD list of the songs, with
> descriptions in clear English (rather than a rote copy of the uselessness
> that s the player guide). If not, I will make one and let everyone give input.

The bard guide on EQ Vault has some mistakes, but it has more than other lists
tend to have. I wrote it though, so I'm biased. Already it needs updating.

Jyzan
